item.title: Want a Halloween track!?
item.description:
I got the chance to remix something for one of my favorite labels , 'Sick SlaughterHouse'. Everything they put out is massive and dirty , right up my alley , and I'm sure up many of yours too! Long story short , the remix came out so angry sounding , you might as well throw knifes at your crowd. If you didn't bring your bag of switch blades to your Halloween gig , don't worry , because this track might as well count as a weapon. Listen on Soundcloud , then go grab it from Beatport!

Idiot Boyz - Strange Massacre (Figure Remix) OUT NOW by Figure

PICK IT UP ON BEATPORT HERE!


- Figure
7DB1E548-B394-4B28-8B75-1AE489B86D5B
1.02.28
item.author: askfigure@aol.com (FIGURE)

item.title: Subdrive Takes over CMJ
item.description:
Our boys at Subdrive are planning a takeover at this year's CMJ events. Tonight DC meets NYC at their 3rd annual CMJ Showcase! This year they've brought up some close friends, a new face, and the rest of the crew to rock the upstairs of Gallery Bar in the LES!

Now, most of the Subdrive crew is originally from the DC metro area, and they are plenty proud to have so many guests from their old stomping grounds.

If you are in the area, check it out - DJ sets from: NOUVEAU RICHE, TERROR DACTEL, COBRA KRAMES, Mr. Vega, NY DUTCH and with live performaces from ALVIN RISK (Sex Cult) and Charlie Tippie

If not, check out some of their tracks!


Alvin Risk - At Last by AlvinRisk

The Five One - Mandatory (Terror Dactel Remix) by TERRORDACTEL

Don Diablo & Diplo - Make You Pop (Dynasty Remix) by Mr_Vega_Music

- Mannes of Team Jaguar
item.author: DJMannes@gmail.com (Manley ©)

item.title: Repeat Offenders - Mad Arrogant
item.description:
Repeat Offenders, the collaboration of DJ’s B.O.N.S. & Vadum Rankin, are two of the most arrogant folks you'll ever meet... and with good reason. These boys maybe new to the scene but in their short time they have been main support for a slew of friggin' huge artists, been playing all over their local stomping grounds of Boston and are the newest members of the PH Recordings Family.

Now the duo has released their first single on Beatport entitled “Bring that Bass Back.” It's a bouncy and dirty track, full of audio pheromones that will send every on the dancefloor into a tizzy. Remember that scene in "Event Horizon" where they see the footage of the previous ship and what happen to the crew... it's like that just with less space travel involved.

A sample of the single is below along with the Beatport link Here... also two other remixes by Repeat Offenders that we think you'll enjoy...

Repeat Offenders - Bring That Bass Back (Original Mix) by repeatoffenders

Drop the Lime - Sex Sax (Repeat Offenders Party Edit) by repeatoffenders

Project Pat featuring Three 6 Mafia - Good Googly Moogly (Repeat Offenders Remix) by repeatoffenders



- Mannes of Team Jaguar
item.author: DJMannes@gmail.com (Manley ©)

item.title: I Got it!
item.description:
Got another free one for ya! I take Aretha Franklin's classic and milk it for a one liner. Full of soulful yet hype builds and some trashing wobbles trading off with each other , this is one for the ragers and ravers. Enjoy!

Figure - I Got It (Original Mix) FREE DOWNLOAD by Figure

Don't forget to follow me on Twitter!

- Figure

item.title: DATAMIX 11
item.description:
Seems like it was just yesterday and we were posting DATAMIX 2 - Now look at this, DATAMIX 11 already. My how the time flies.

I don't have much to say, this mix pretty much speaks for itself. I wil say this though, this is one of my favorite mixes of all time from DD. For Reals. Check it...

DATAMIX 11 by Designer Drugs - THE POWER / SEX CULT RECORDS

item.title: Heapy - In The Party EP!
item.description:
Heapy is no stranger to Penned Madness , with that killer KRS-ONE bootleg we posted a bit ago that got massive traffic , you know he was coming back for more. THaF (The Hats and Friends) a new label based out of Jersey in the UK picked him up for his first full ep release. Heapy's 'In the Party' is basically a collection of 3 fresh bass tunes , everything from disco morphed to bass to some rave throw back vibes. Listen to the 3 tracks below , then go support and buy them from Beatport HERE

In The Party by Heapy

Wreck The Discothèque by Heapy

Funky Feeling by Heapy

Now for the freebie. I've been playing this out at every gig since he gave me the first version , now its cleaned up and ready for the public to take hold.
'Keepin It Real' is a bit of a throw back UK vibe but then spins around into a dance floor hammer. Deep sub and some nice garage drums , this is nothing to over look!

Heapy - Keeping It Real - FREE DOWNLOAD by Heapy

- Figure
item.author: askfigure@aol.com (FIGURE)

item.title: Get out of my head... or not?
item.description:
So this writer doesn't listen to much mainstream radio, like none at all - zero. Not trying to sound like a 'cool kid' or anything, it just doesn't happen. Well, this past week I personally spent an inordinate amount of time in a car, like stircrazy Chevy Chase in "Vacation" time, and I only had regional Florida hip-hop stations to musically guide me during this madcap adventure.

A byproduct of that much time listening the radio being that, at the moment, there are currently about 14 different 'chart toppers' battling for supremacy in my headpiece - one of them being the "electro"/hip-hop outfit Far East Movement. Don't know much about FEM besides that they have some pretty addicting music and very high self esteems - eager to see what constant radio play and internet love will mean for these boys... we shall soon find out...

So anyways, yes, we know everyone has been keen to this song for a minute but remixes are popping up lately so why not post'm up. Included in this here post is the original choon (which is plenty dance-y enough) and two remixes that I am personally enjoying at the moment...


Far East Movement feat. The Cataracts- Like a G6

FM - Like a G6 (Disco Fries Remix) by DiscoFriesMusic

Like a G6 (JeRK Mumblin Remix) by JeRK

and a little treat... another Far East Movement track, remixed by Hot Pink Delorean.

Far East Movement - Girls On The Dancefloor (Hot Pink Delorean Remix) by NEON LIGER

- Mannes of Team Jaguar
item.author: DJMannes@gmail.com (Manley ©)

item.title: Dskotek is at it again!
item.description:
It's been a second since we have got some new freebies from LA's monster duo Dskotek. This tune their handing out reminds me of the exact music the kids over there prefer , nutty dutch madness! The build is up quite progressive and automatically brings a hype tension to the dance floor , once it drops its full on with sirens and big room drums. Don't sleep on this one if your one for hyper music. Make sure to run to their soundcloud page and grab all the other free goodies while your at it!

Dskotek - Shuffle (Original Track) by Dskotek

This remix has found it's way into some big peoples sets , and now..maybe yours. Same deal as the last song , this one will get the raves moving. Grab it!

Tiesto ft. Diplo - C'mon (Dskotek Remix) by Dskotek

- Figure
item.author: askfigure@aol.com (FIGURE)

item.title: Calvertron
item.description:
Now I don't normally post about releases and such without anything to download , but this release deserves some shine. We all know Calvertron's work , he has always been hustling some banging tunes out for all of us to play.
Over the past couple releases he has been doing a lot of LFO work and furthering his sound even more , and if you know me then you know I'd giddy about proper bassline stuff. So his last release on Jack Knife Records (which he runs) just dropped and has started to chart , I wanted to expose this to you in-case you overlooked it. Both tracks build up on well known disco samples and drop to heavy wobble jack basslines , give them a listen and go to beaport and buy them HERE

Calvertron - Hit Da Ground by calvertron

CALVERTRON - EVERYBODY by calvertron

YEA RIGHT! I gotta give something away , download his new mix for free!

CALVERTRON MIX AUGUST 2010 by calvertron

- Figure
item.author: askfigure@aol.com (FIGURE)

item.description:
Team Jaguar is playing at "Mixtape" tomorrow in Fort Meyers at the Indigo Room with Hot Pink Delorean. It will probably sound something like this...

Cool newish track from Douster that we're digging.


Douster & Savage Skulls feat. Robyn - Bad Gal

Props to Ethos on this great remix of a killer classic. This one moves dances floors in crazy ways.


Haddaway - What Is Love (DJ Ethos Remix)

This one was on the new A-Trak mixtape. The track has no low end so you can essentially put it on top of any awesome bassline and make it sound sweet.


A-Trak - Trizzy Turnt Up (Dirty)

Cold Blank track that dropped yesterday. Pretty solid. Major peak hour shit. Uses the same "WHOO!" sample in that Afronuts song by Yolanda Be Cool.


Cold Blank - The Flying Cat (the Bulgarian Remix)

Hope you enjoy the tracks :-)

- Ben Danner
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (BenDanner)

item.title: Hostage - Versatile Sound
item.description:
'Hostage' did it again! 'JFK' from 'Mstrkrft' just dropped 'Hostage's' new ep 'Versatile Sound' on his own label 'Teenage Riot Record' . If you know 'Hostage's' music then you know what to expect here. Don't sleep on this one if you're a fan of the heavy tunes. But as a bonus , were giving away 'Hostage's' remix of my single 'Torture' for free for the first time!

Hostage - Versatile Sound by HOSTAGE

Hostage - Make 'Em Drop by HOSTAGE

Make sure to grab both tracks on Beaport HERE!

Played by 'Ac Slater' and "Foamo', this remix is not to be taken lightly. Huge bass stabs and squeaks for weeks , grab it for FREE and bust some cheeks.

Figure - Torture (Hostage Remix) by HOSTAGE
- Figure

item.title: Subliminal = Bass
item.description:
I came across Subliminal on Soundcloud , and as it seems , I was late on the game! A lot of people are supporting his music , and this post is so hopefully you will too. All this stuff is cheeky heavy bass music , and it's been slaying people during my sets. Being a Marvel nerd , my favorite out of these four is 'The Juggernaut' , fast drums and crunched bass for the win. The track 'Outlandish' reminds me of King Koopa making dubstep in his castle , and 'Drums Please!' is just a fucking nutty percussion track that is not to be overlooked! I let you handle the Baggy Bottom Boys bootleg , it's grade A bass. He also remixed my single 'Torture' for the official remix ep which is out soon , so keep a eye on this blog for a post about that! All of these have their download link enabled , so grab em up! Enjoy!

The Juggernaut by Subliminal.

Outlandish by Subliminal.

Drums Please by Subliminal.

Baggy Bottom Boys (Subliminals Bootleg Remix) - JOTS by Subliminal.

Download his new mix HERE or stream it from his Mix Cloud profile

Dimensions Mixtape by Subliminal on Mixcloud



2 seconds for shameless self promotion. Check out my new remix for Bart B More!
Bart B More & Tommie Sunshine - Drop Acid (Figure Remix) Preview by Figure
- Figure
item.author: askfigure@aol.com (FIGURE)

item.title: The Aces of Bass Vol. 3!
item.description:
1.Robot Disaster - Boy (Jeuce Rework)
2.Hostage - Requiem (Original Mix)
3.Filthy Rehab - Do It now! (Figure and Danny Soundz Remix)
4.Figure - We Are Warriors (Original Mix)
5.Guttstar - Not Money or Show (Kastle Remix)
6.Big Boi - Shutterbug (Jack Beats Remix)
7.Diplo and Don Diabo - Make you Pop (Tommie Sunshine and Figure Remix)
8.Calvertron - Everybody (Original Mix)
9.Filthy Rehab - Do It Now!(Original Mix)
10.Ajapai - What Do You Hear (Clockwatcher Edit)
11.Figure - Ima Drop (Original Mix)
12.Figure - The Phantom (Original Mix)
13.Figure - Lover Of the Broken (Original Mix)
14.Flinch - Crankenstein (Original Mix)
15.WoNk - Lets Av It (Filthy Rehab Remix)
16.Guido Van Santen - Hotter Than Hot! (Figure Remix)

Ya'll know the deal! The Aces of Bass series is a mix I do almost every month , full of heavy bass madness! This one is no different , I got tons of exclusives for the mix for you to break your neck to , included new Calvertron , Jack Beats , and 5 new tunes from myself! Tommie Sunshine and myself did a remix for Diplo and Don Diablo's 'Make You Pop' that drops in a couple weeks , and you can hear it here first! Stream it here or download HERE Enjoy.

The Ace Of Bass Volume 3 by Figure on Mixcloud

item.title: Pure Sexiness
item.description:
M.I.A. + Sebastien Tellier = Pure Sexiness. The man with the sexy beats meets the woman with the sexy voice in this ultra-smooth mashup. This is what it would sound like if Tellier and M.I.A. made some babies.

M.I.A. & Sebastien Tellier - XR Kilo (Ben Danner Mix) by BenDanner

item.title: THE PHANTOM!
item.description:
Since Halloween is the best holiday ever , I've started working on a free ep of covers of Halloween/Horror music. This is the first one that is finished , it's called 'The Phantom'. 'The Phantom' is a heavy bassline track based on the Overture from 'The Phantom of the Opera'. If you know my music , then you know what to expect here , big pianos and grinding bass. Grab the free download from my soundclound and make sure to keep this in your goodie bag for your Halloween gigs! Enjoy!

Figure - The Phantom (Original Mix) *Free Download* by Figure

In light of all things evil , don't forgot to grab some other creepy freebies!

Figure - Torture (Original Mix) by Figure

Figure - Dirty Damage (Original Mix) *Free DL* by Figure


- Figure
item.author: askfigure@aol.com (FIGURE)

item.title: Pump it up!
item.description:
The Lempo and Japwow Project consists of two producers who have come together over their love of house music.

Having their first track signed to major label Cr2 records and due out in the next few months "The Lempo and Japwow Project" is bringing house music with a twist to your ears.
Their second track is a jacking house influenced dutch style track. Mixing up big room dutch house synths with crazy jacked up house beats.
Gaining support already from major dj's and gathering the attention of big labels from their start this project is set to explode into 2011. Special thanks to WoNked Records out in the UK for the tip on his fresh project!


The Lempo and Japwow Project - Pump Pump (Original Mix)

Really looking forward to seeing what these two have in store! Stay locked!
item.author: StarrRadar@gmail.com (Mark Starr)

item.title: Penned Madness Sessions 10 with Dani Deahl
item.description:
Our 10th Penned Madness Session on Digitally Imported was yesterday and we were thankful enough to have a murderous mix from fellow blogger and Chi-Town resident Dani Deahl. We have been following Ms. Deahl's work since we started PM and are happy to be able to show her some much deserved love.

Dani's latest mix is a collection of tunes that folks have sent to her over the past few months, in which she has then blogged about. We have included some of the tracks below (to ensnare you travelers from hype machine) and any other tracks that may tickle your fancy can be found throughout DSQUARED.

dsquared Vol. 1 by Dani Deahl

Tracklist:
1. Axwell: Nothing But Love (Diesel Laws Remix)
2. Nick Thayer: Ten Acre Dust
3. Tiga: What You Need (Lucky Date Remix)
4. Playdoe: Ice Cream (Lapse Remix)
5. Boy 8-Bit: Suspense Is Killing Me (Philipe de Boyer Remix)
6. Danny Tenaglia: Music Is The Answer (Breakdown Remix)
7. Swedish House Mafia vs. Lady Gaga vs. Congorock: One Monster (Morningstar Mix)
8. Lee Mortimer & Foamo: Superman (Reset! Remix)
9. Calvertron & Tim Healey: Back 2 The Ghetto (Mother Superior Turf Invasion Edit)
10. Only Children: Don’t Stop (DJ Kue Remix)
11. Mason feat. DMC & Sam Sparro: Corrected (Riva Starr Vocal Remix)
12. Andy Caldwell: Funk Nasty feat. Gram’ma Funk (Wolfgang Gartner Remix)
13. Tape Deck Bros: Ela e Linda
14. Reboot: Enjoy (Dooze Jackers Remix)
15. Matty G & Reeps: Party ‘n’ Play (Sloppy 5ths Remix)
16. Hijack vs. Hatiras: Possessed By A Bitch (JLR Mashapella)
17. Deadmau5 & Fixd: Some Chords (And Some More Noted Fixd Remix)
18. La Roux: Bulletproof (Larry Tee & Alexander Technique Blogula Remix)
19. Hostage: Roll

dsquared Vol. 1 by DaniDeahl

- Manley of Team Jaguar
